    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractTile
    Base class for all tiles in the game world.
    App
    Main JavaFX application class for the Farming Game.
    Crop
    Abstract class representing a general crop in the game.
    CropStage
    Enum representing the different growth stages of a crop.
    DayCycle
    Manages the day/night cycle timing and transitions.
    Direction
    Represents the four cardinal movement directions for entities.
    DirtTile
    Represents a farmable dirt tile.
    FlyingItem
    Represents an item flying from one position to another on the screen.
    GameLoop
    Manages the main game loop, updating the world, rendering, and handling pause state.
    GrassTile
    Represents a grass tile.
    Growable
    Interface for crops that can grow over time.
    HoeTool
    Tool representing a hoe used to till soil.
    InputHandler
    Handles keyboard input and converts it into player actions or game commands.
    Interactable
    Interface for objects in the world that can be interacted with by the player.
    Inventory
    Represents the player's inventory.
    Player
    Player class representing the player entity in the game.
    Player.PickupRequest
    Represents a pickup animation request for crops.
    PlayerAction
    Represents the current action state of the player.
    Renderer
    Renderer is responsible for drawing the entire game state onto a JavaFX Canvas.
    ResourceManager
    Utility class responsible for loading external game resources.
    SeedTool
    Tool used for planting seeds into tilled soil.
    SeedType
    Enumeration of all supported seed types.
    TileType
    Enumeration of all tile types in the game world.
    Tomato
    Represents a tomato crop.
    Tool
    Abstract base class for all tools usable by the player.
    ToolType
    Enumeration of all supported tool categories in the game.
    WaterTile
    Represents a water tile.
    Wheat
    Represents a wheat crop.
    World
    Represents the game world.
